dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset containing video clips of various actions recorded in different kitchens, designed for egocentric action recognition.
dcterms:title: EPIC-Kitchens Dataset

dcterms:description: A novel multi-modal dataset consisting of actions performed by humans, animals, and cartoon figures, designed to promote research in multi-modal domain generalization.
dcterms:title: Human-Animal-Cartoon (HAC) Dataset
